title: An In-Depth Guide to Rihanna’s Birth Chart

steps.title: Overview of Rihanna’s Birth Chart
steps.content: Overview of Rihanna’s Birth Chart Rihanna was born on February 20, 1988 in St. Michael parish, Barbados. [1] X Research source This means her sun sign is artistic and intuitive Pisces, but this is only one piece of the puzzle! [2] X Research source Here are the rest of Rihanna’s astrological placements: Sun : Pisces Moon : Aries Mercury : Aquarius Venus : Aries Mars : Sagittarius Jupiter : Aries Saturn : Capricorn Uranus : Capricorn Neptune : Capricorn Pluto : Scorpio

steps.title: Sun in Pisces
steps.content: Sun in Pisces In astrology, your sun sign represents your core identity and personality. [3] X Research source Rihanna’s sun is in Pisces , a water sign known for sensitivity and creativity. [4] X Research source They often channel their strong emotions into artistic pursuits. [5] X Research source “Music is a huge thing with Pisces,” says expert astrologer Angel Eyedealism. “Music and art and colors.” With this in mind, it makes sense that Rihanna has so many successful artistic endeavors, from music and acting to makeup and fashion design!

steps.title: Moon in Aries
steps.content: Moon in Aries Your moon sign represents your inner world and emotions. [6] X Research source Rihanna’s moon sign is in the bold and energetic fire sign, Aries. Aries moons are known for being dynamic and passionate. [7] X Research source Their emotions are as intense as fireworks, and they aren’t afraid to express them. [8] X Research source Known for being bold, confident, and authentic, Rihanna is the quintessential Aries moon! [9] X Research source

steps.title: Mercury in Aquarius
steps.content: Mercury in Aquarius Your mercury sign determines the way you think and communicate. [10] X Research source Rihanna’s Mercury is in the intelligent and altruistic air sign, Aquarius. [11] X Research source Those with Aquarius Mercury signs are unconventional forward-thinkers who aren’t afraid to push boundaries. They're natural-born activists who always stand up for what’s right. [12] X Research source This energy is clear in Rihanna’s career, so it’s no surprise that she’s an Aquarius Mercury! For example, when Rihanna launched Fenty Beauty, in 2017, she completely shook up the beauty industry by introducing a 40 shade foundation range with options for people of all skin tones. This level of inclusivity and diversity was not the norm at the time. Rihanna’s bold launch created a new standard and changed the industry for the better. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Venus in Aries
steps.content: Venus in Aries According to Angel Eyedealism, Venus “represents art, love, beauty, aesthetics, and money.” Your Venus sign reveals how you feel and express love, and Rihanna’s Venus is in fiery Aries. Those with an Aries Venus are daring when it comes to flirting—they’re not afraid to tell you how they feel! [14] X Research source They’re also bold, passionate lovers who seek excitement in their romantic relationships. [15] X Research source Considering Rihanna’s confidence, magnetism, and plethora of fiery songs about love, her Aries Venus makes sense!

steps.title: Mars in Sagittarius
steps.content: Mars in Sagittarius In Astrology, Mars is the planet of passion and aggression. It governs things like sensuality, competition, and ambition. [16] X Research source Rihanna’s Mars is in the adventurous fire sign, Sagittarius. Those with a Sagittarius Mars are restless and excitement-seeking. They hate feeling stagnant, so they’re always seeking out new experiences to propel them forward. This often means taking on tons of new business and creative projects at a time. [17] X Research source With so many successful endeavors in the music, fashion, and beauty industries at once, it's no wonder Rihanna is a Sagittarius Mercury! [18] X Research source

steps.title: Key Takeaways
steps.content: Key Takeaways Based on her astrological placements, Rihanna was destined to become a star. With her Pisces sun, she’s an expert at channeling her emotions into creative endeavors. Her Aries moon, Aries Venus, and Sagittarius Mars make her bold and unafraid to be in the public eye. And, with an Aquarius Mercury, she’s got the heart of an activist and a desire to make the world a better place. With all this in mind, it’s no wonder Rihanna’s one of the most iconic and influential celebrities of our time!
